description: This notification is sent when the value of a TDM port error condition statistic has exceeded the
configured threshold, or the value has dropped back below the threshold.

event.Summary: TDM port error threshold alarm occurred

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMAlarm PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMAlarmVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMAlarmThreshold i 9999 PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMAlarmValue i 9999

description: The OID of the variable whose value is being monitored. Depending on the time interval,
the error condition and the modue and circuit ID, this points to an object from an entry in
variables.name: PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMAlarmVariable

description: The alarm condition threshold for this alarm entry. The alarm is triggered if the value of the
object pointed by prvtPwVcTDMAlarmVariable remains above this threshold for more than 3 seconds.
variables.name: PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMAlarmThreshold

description: The value of the object pointed to by prvtPwVcTDMAlarmVariable, present for notification purposes.
variables.name: PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMAlarmValue

description: This notification is sent when the operational or administrative status of circuit changes.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1 && $v2==1) ? 'TDM in up state' : 'TDM operational status: $v1; administrative status: $v2'

description: The operational status of the circuit.
variables.name: PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMOperStatus

description: The administrative status of the circuit.
variables.name: PRVT-PW-TDM-MIB::prvtPwVcTDMCfgAdminStatus
